Posts.Content: Tootiefnfruitie wrote: I am on my 4th week of radiation and about a week ago i started having some pinkish discharge, it looks like there is some specs in there. my Doctors keep telling me that its not radiation related just like they told me my nausea was not ( pfft yea right ) I did my own research and found that its somehwat common amoungest people who get radiation in the stomach area and lower. well my breast reddness is going down all the way to my rib cage area so obviously its targeting a little of my stomach area. ive never had problems down there before and im extremely frustrated that noone is taking me seriously and i cant get any answers from anyone about this. im worred that it is going to effect my wa nting to have children down the road. In my findings i read that it can thin the wals of your vagina and cuase some discharge with shredding of tissue. im really crying out and hoping someone else has experianced this as i suffer from depression and this is the last thing i need on top of cancer. can someone please respond to me thank you in advance for any responses Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Vaginal Bleeding during Radiation ( PLEASE HELP ) Tootiefnfruitie Larkspur
